params._authority: The address authorized to control game progression.
params._houseFeeBasisPoints: The house's cut of the pot, in basis points.
params._keyHash: The gas lane key hash for the desired gas price.
params._minBet: The minimum bet amount in wei.
params._subscriptionId: The ID of the Chainlink VRF subscription.
params._treasury: The address where house fees will be sent.
params._vrfCoordinator: The address of the Chainlink VRF Coordinator contract.
params._waitingPhaseDuration: The duration of the betting window in seconds.

createGame().details: This function is payable and expects a value equal to the bet amount.

placeBet().details: This function is payable and expects a value equal to the bet amount.

acceptOwnership().notice: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

closeBettingWindow().notice: Closes the betting window for the current round. Called by the crank.

constructor.notice: Initializes the contract with its core configuration and Chainlink VRF parameters.

createGame().notice: Creates a new game round with the first bet and requests randomness from Chainlink VRF.

placeBet().notice: Places a bet in the current, active game round.

selectWinnerAndPayout().notice: Selects a winner using fulfilled VRF randomness and distributes the payout. Called by the crank.

setCoordinator(address).notice: Sets the VRF Coordinator addressThis method should only be callable by the coordinator or contract owner

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address.
